import React, {useState} from 'react' const Products = () => { const [rice, setRice] = useState({foodName: 'rice', price:50}); const [beans, setBeans] = useState({foodName: 'beans', price:20}) return ( <>

FOOD MENU

Rice

So sweet a very good rice.

Buy (${rice.price})
{beans.n}

So sweet a very good beans.

Buy (${beans.price})
) } export default Products
